alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca and southern St. Louis Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gunn, to near Canyon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canyon around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Coleraine, Taconite and Pengilly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; South Itasca
